LanguageData.Settings_HardcoreMode_Tooltip: Tools wear 50% quicker and most tasks that require tools in order to be done effectively will no longer be doable without their required tools.
LanguageData.Settings_ToolMapGen_Tooltip: Whether or not low-quality basic tools will generate along with ruined structures upon map generation.
LanguageData.Settings_ToolLimit_Tooltip: Whether or not colonists are limited to only being able to carry a certain amount of tools at once in their inventory (other than when caravanning).
LanguageData.Settings_ToolOptimization_Tooltip: Whether or not colonists will attempt to automatically optimize their inventory tools. Disabling may improve performance and fix any oddities with some modded materials.
LanguageData.Settings_PickupFromStorageOnly: Only pick up tools from storage
LanguageData.Settings_PickupFromStorageOnly_Tooltip: When enabled, pawns will only acquire tools that are in valid storage. When disabled, pawns may also pick up tools in the Home area (but not forbidden or burning items).
LanguageData.Settings_DebugLogging_Tooltip: When enabled, SurvivalTools will log detailed information about tool selection, swaps, and pre-work pickup logic to the debug console. Recommended only for troubleshooting or mod development. More to come later.
LanguageData.Settings_AutoTool: Automatically pick up the right tool before work
LanguageData.Settings_AutoTool_Tooltip: When enabled, pawns will check for and pick up the most suitable tool before starting a job.
LanguageData.ColonistNeedsSurvivalToolDesc: The following colonists are assigned to work tasks that require tools in order to be performed effectively but lack the tools to do so
LanguageData.SurvivalToolNeedsReplacingDesc: The following colonists are using tools that will break within half a day of use
